title: Trump Goes to the Border Amid Shutdown: A Closer Look | Jokes Seth Can't Tell
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump traveling to Texas to make the case for his border wall as the government shutdown drags on.

Then, Seth is joined by Amber Ruffin and Jenny Hagel for some Jokes Seth Can't Tell.

Look out for an exclusive podcast interview between Seth Meyers and Andy Samberg on Monday.
